name: Portal Run!
description:
Tap the screen to warp beweeen lines, but be careful, you must have a great timing!

Avoid obstacles or your run will be ended. Try to run as much as you can!

Collect coins to unlock unique stylish new characters.

Game Features:
◉ Free to play
◉ Endless gameplay
◉ One-Tap Control
◉ Challenge your friends with the best highscore

What is your best score?
